verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

Every <S%H376>man<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H2583>pitch<s%> by his own <S%H1714>standard,<s%> with the <S%H226>ensign<s%> of their <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house:<s%> <S%H5048>far<s%> off <S%H5439>about<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> shall they <S%H2583>pitch.<s%>

And on the <S%H6924>east<s%> <S%H6924>side<s%> toward the <S%H4217>rising<s%> of the sun shall they of the <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H2583>pitch<s%> throughout their <S%H6635>armies:<s%> and <S%H5177>Nahshon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5992>Amminadab<s%> shall be <S%H5387>captain<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>

And his <S%H6635>host,<s%> and those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, were three <S%H7657>score<s%> and <S%H702>fourteen<s%> <S%H7657><s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

And those that do <S%H2583>pitch<s%> next to him shall be the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar:<s%> and <S%H5417>Nethaneel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6686>Zuar<s%> shall be <S%H5387>captain<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar.<s%>
And his <S%H6635>host,<s%> and those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> thereof, were <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

Then the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun:<s%> and <S%H446>Eliab<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2497>Helon<s%> shall be <S%H5387>captain<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun.<s%>
And his <S%H6635>host,<s%> and those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> thereof, were <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> were an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> throughout their <S%H6635>armies.<s%> These shall <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H5265>set<s%> <S%H5265>forth.<s%>

On the <S%H8486>south<s%> side shall be the <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> according to their <S%H6635>armies:<s%> and the <S%H5387>captain<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> shall be <S%H468>Elizur<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7707>Shedeur.<s%>
And his <S%H6635>host,<s%> and those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> thereof, were <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

And those which <S%H2583>pitch<s%> by him shall be the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon:<s%> and the <S%H5387>captain<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> shall be <S%H8017>Shelumiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6701>Zurishaddai.<s%>
And his <S%H6635>host,<s%> and those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, were <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>
Then the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad:<s%> and the <S%H5387>captain<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad<s%> shall be <S%H460>Eliasaph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7467>Reuel.<s%>

And his <S%H6635>host,<s%> and those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, were <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben<s%> were an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty,<s%> throughout their <S%H6635>armies.<s%> And they shall <S%H5265>set<s%> <S%H5265>forth<s%> in the <S%H8145>second<s%> rank.

Then the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%> shall <S%H5265>set<s%> <S%H5265>forward<s%> with the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> in the <S%H8432>middle<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp:<s%> as they <S%H2583>encamp,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> shall they <S%H5265>set<s%> <S%H5265>forward,<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> in his <S%H3027>place<s%> by their <S%H1714>standards.<s%>

On the <S%H3220>west<s%> side shall be the <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> according to their <S%H6635>armies:<s%> and the <S%H5387>captain<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> shall be <S%H476>Elishama<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5989>Ammihud.<s%>
And his <S%H6635>host,<s%> and those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, were <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

And by him shall be the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh:<s%> and the <S%H5387>captain<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> shall be <S%H1583>Gamaliel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6301>Pedahzur.<s%>
And his <S%H6635>host,<s%> and those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, were <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and two <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

Then the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin:<s%> and the <S%H5387>captain<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> shall be <S%H27>Abidan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1441>Gideoni.<s%>
And his <S%H6635>host,<s%> and those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, were <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> were an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and an <S%H3967>hundred,<s%> throughout their <S%H6635>armies.<s%> And they shall <S%H5265>go<s%> <S%H5265>forward<s%> in the <S%H7992>third<s%> rank.

The <S%H1714>standard<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> shall be on the <S%H6828>north<s%> side by their <S%H6635>armies:<s%> and the <S%H5387>captain<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> shall be <S%H295>Ahiezer<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5993>Ammishaddai.<s%>
And his <S%H6635>host,<s%> and those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, were three <S%H8346>score<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

And those that <S%H2583>encamp<s%> by him shall be the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H836>Asher:<s%> and the <S%H5387>captain<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H836>Asher<s%> shall be <S%H6295>Pagiel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5918>Ocran.<s%>
And his <S%H6635>host,<s%> and those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, were <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

Then the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali:<s%> and the <S%H5387>captain<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali<s%> shall be <S%H299>Ahira<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5881>Enan.<s%>
And his <S%H6635>host,<s%> and those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of them, were <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> they that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan<s%> were an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred.<s%> They shall <S%H5265>go<s%> <S%H314>hindmost<s%> with their <S%H1714>standards.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are those which were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> by the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> those that were <S%H6485>numbered<s%> of the <S%H4264>camps<s%> throughout their <S%H6635>hosts<s%> were <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty.<s%>
But the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> were not <S%H6485>numbered<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses:<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> they <S%H2583>pitched<s%> by their <S%H1714>standards,<s%> and <S%H3651>so<s%> they <S%H5265>set<s%> <S%H5265>forward,<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> after their <S%H4940>families,<s%> <S%H5921>according<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers.<s%>
